name: Bhanru Ramkrishnapur Gramin Unnayan Sanstha

address: Vill & P.O. – Bhanru Ramkrishnapur,  P.S. – Bishnupur

briefDescription: BHANRU RAMKRISHNAPUR GRAMIN UNNAYAN SANSTHA started its journey from 2005 as a Non-Government, voluntary organization seeking to reach out most marginalized and vulnerable communities of the people of South 24 Parganas district of west Bengal of India.
